Pre-Game Insights: Both Benin and Libya have shown defensive fragility in their recent outings.
Steve Mounie’s influence on Benin’s attack is significant, averaging two shots on target per game.
Others: Neither side has looked particularly sharp in recent matches, but their respective strengths and weaknesses might set up an exciting game.
Benin’s defence was exposed in their defeat to Nigeria, but they will be hoping for a more cohesive display against a less formidable Libyan attack.
Libya have been struggling to keep clean sheets and will likely focus on improving their defensive organisation.
